title: december 29: let’s bowl
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the invention of the modern bowling ball, and on the way she gives us almost the entire history of bowling itself. She also revisits a ridiculous lawsuit stemming from a show gone wrong. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
